name: Snap Guys
description:
What happens if you mix Fall Guys and Mario Slaparazzi ? This game !

Try to be in the photo and punch the other out of it in this chaotic Party Game !
Play solo with 5 AIs, or up to 4 Players with 2 AIs
Move with Arrows, WASD, Joystick or DPad 
Punch is automatic if close enough to others :p

Thanks to Mix & Jam For his Mario Party’s Slaparazzi video that inspired this game :)

Please Share if you like the game, Comment for feedbacks, issues or bugs :)

Happy Snapping !

iOS link : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/snap-guys/id1542504605
Android link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bretzelstudio.selfieroyale
